item.text: After we tore ourselves away from them, we put out to sea, and sailing a straight course, we came to Cos, on the next day to Rhodes, and from there to Patara.

We <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st> <st data-num="1276" class="">crossing over</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5403" class="">Phoenicia</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1910" class="">went aboard</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="321">put out to sea</st>.<n id="4" />

After we <st data-num="398" class="">sighted</st> <st data-num="2954" class="">Cyprus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2641" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="2641" class="">behind</st> <st data-num="2176" class="">on our port side</st>,<n id="2" /> we <st data-num="4126">sailed on</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4947" class="">Syria</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2718">put in</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="5184" class="">Tyre</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> to <st data-num="670" class="">unload</st> its <st data-num="1117" class="">cargo</st> there.

After we <st data-num="429" class="">located</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, we <st data-num="1961" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="847">there</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>. <st data-num="3748" class="">They</st> repeatedly <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="1910">set foot</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1822" class="">over</st>,<n id="2" /> we <st data-num="1831" class="">left</st> and <st data-num="4198">went on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4311" class="">way</st>. <st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> of them, <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> their <st data-num="1135" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>, accompanied<n id="3" /> us <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> of the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>. After<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5087 1119">kneeling down</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="123" class="">beach</st> and <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st>,<n id="5" />

we <st data-num="782">said farewell</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="240">one another</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="2" /> we <st data-num="305" class="">went aboard</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">ship</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">they</st> <st data-num="5290" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">their own homes</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> <st data-num="1274" class="">continued</st> the <st data-num="4144" class="">voyage</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5184" class="">Tyre</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2658" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4424" class="">Ptolemais</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when we had <st data-num="782" class="">greeted</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>, we <st data-num="3306" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> for <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>.

On <st data-num="1887">the next day</st> we <st data-num="1831" class="">left</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2542" class="">Caesarea</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="5376" class="">Philip</st> the <st data-num="2099" class="">evangelist</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1537">one of</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st>,<n id="4" /> and <st data-num="3306" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
(He had four unmarried daughters who prophesied.)
While we remained there for a number of days, a prophet named Agabus came down from Judea.

He <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">took</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3972">Paul’s</st> <st data-num="2223" class="">belt</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1210" class="">tied</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> with it,<n id="5" /> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “The <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st> <st data-num="3592" class="">this:</st> ‘<st data-num="3779">This is the way</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> will <st data-num="1210">tie up</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="2223" class="">belt</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="3860" class="">hand</st> him <st data-num="3860" class="">over</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1484">Gentiles</st>.’”

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1786">local people</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3870" class="">begged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="305">go up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> are you <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st>, <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4919" class="">breaking</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2192">am</st> <st data-num="2093" class="">ready</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> to be <st data-num="1210">tied up</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> to <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.”
Because he could not be persuaded, we said no more except, “The Lord’s will be done.”
After these days we got ready and started up to Jerusalem.

Some of the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2542" class="">Caesarea</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4905">came along</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st>, and <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> to the house<n id="2" /> of <st data-num="3416" class="">Mnason</st> of <st data-num="2953" class="">Cyprus</st>, a <st data-num="3101" class="">disciple</st> from the <st data-num="744" class="">earliest times</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> we were to <st data-num="3579" class="">stay</st>.

When <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>, the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="588" class="">welcomed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="780" class="">gladly</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="1966">next day</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1524" class="">went in</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> see <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> <st data-num="3854">were there</st>.<n id="1" />

When Paul<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="782" class="">greeted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, he began to <st data-num="1834" class="">explain</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596">in</st> <st data-num="1520">detail</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="4" /> had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1248" class="">ministry</st>.

When they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, they <st data-num="1392" class="">praised</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="5037" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “You <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st>, <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st><st data-num="4214">, how many</st> <st data-num="3461" class="">thousands</st> of <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st><n id="2" /> there are who have <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="5225" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2207">ardent observers</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.<n id="4" />

They have been <st data-num="2727" class="">informed</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>—<st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> now living<n id="1" /> among the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> to <st data-num="646" class="">abandon</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> them <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcise</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st><n id="4" /> according to our <st data-num="1485" class="">customs</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> should we do? They will <st data-num="3843">no doubt</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you have <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>: <st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> <st data-num="1510">have</st> <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st><n id="2" /> who <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> taken<n id="3" /> a <st data-num="2171" class="">vow</st>;<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3880" class="">take</st> <st data-num="3778">them</st> and <st data-num="48" class="">purify</st><n id="1" /> yourself <st data-num="4862">along with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1159" class="">pay</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1159" class="">expenses</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> they may <st data-num="3587" class="">have</st> their <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> <st data-num="3587" class="">shaved</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> will <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> in <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> they have been <st data-num="2727" class="">told</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> that you yourself <st data-num="4748">live</st> in <st data-num="5442" class="">conformity</st> with<n id="6" /> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.<n id="7" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4012">regarding</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> who have <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have <st data-num="1969">written a letter</st>,<n id="1" /> having <st data-num="2919" class="">decided</st><n id="2" /> that <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> should <st data-num="5442" class="">avoid</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1494">meat</st> that has been <st data-num="1494">sacrificed to idols</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> what has been <st data-num="4156" class="">strangled</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>.”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> the <st data-num="2192" class="">next</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>,<n id="1" /> and after he had <st data-num="48" class="">purified</st> himself<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4862" class="">along</st> with <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, he <st data-num="1524" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st> and <st data-num="1229">gave notice</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="1604" class="">completion</st> of the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> of <st data-num="49" class="">purification</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2193 3739">when</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="4376" class="">sacrifice</st> would be <st data-num="4374" class="">offered</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st><n id="6" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> were <st data-num="4931" class="">almost over</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st><n id="2" /> who had <st data-num="2300" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple area</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4797">stirred up</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1911 5495">seized</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="2896" class="">shouting</st>, “<st data-num="435" class="">Men</st> of <st data-num="2475" class="">Israel</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="997" class="">help</st>! <st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> who <st data-num="1321" class="">teaches</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="3837" class="">everywhere</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> our <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, our <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">sanctuary</st>!<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2089 5037 2532">Furthermore</st><n id="4" /> he has <st data-num="1521" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greeks</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2411">inner courts of the temple</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2840" class="">made</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="2840" class="">ritually unclean</st>!”<n id="6" />

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">had</st> <st data-num="4308" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="5161" class="">Trophimus</st> the <st data-num="2180" class="">Ephesian</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> previously, and<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="3543" class="">assumed</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> had <st data-num="1521" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2411">inner temple courts</st>.)<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> was <st data-num="2795">stirred up</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="4890">rushed together</st>.<n id="2" /> They <st data-num="1949" class="">seized</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> and <st data-num="1670" class="">dragged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">out</st> of the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">doors</st> were <st data-num="2808" class="">shut</st>.

While they were <st data-num="2212" class="">trying</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, a <st data-num="5334" class="">report</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="305">sent up</st><n id="3" /> to the <st data-num="5506">commanding officer</st><n id="4" /> of the <st data-num="4686" class="">cohort</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> was <st data-num="4797">in confusion</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="3739" class="">He</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1824" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1543" class="">centurions</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2701">ran down</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">crowd</st>.<n id="4" /> When they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st><n id="5" /> the <st data-num="5506">commanding officer</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st>, they <st data-num="3973" class="">stopped</st> <st data-num="5180" class="">beating</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="5506" class="">commanding officer</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1448">came up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1949" class="">arrested</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to be <st data-num="1210">tied up</st> with <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="254" class="">chains;</st><n id="3" /> he<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st> <st data-num="4441" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="4441" class="">he</st> had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="243" class="">some</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="2019" class="">shouted</st> <st data-num="5100">one thing</st>, and others <st data-num="243">something else</st>,<n id="1" /> and when the commanding officer<n id="2" /> was <st data-num="3361 1410">unable</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1097" class="">find out</st> the <st data-num="804">truth</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="2351" class="">disturbance</st>,<n id="5" /> he <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st><n id="6" /> to be <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3925" class="">barracks</st>.<n id="7" />

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> he <st data-num="1096" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="304" class="">steps</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">Paul</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4819">had</st> to be <st data-num="941" class="">carried</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> the <st data-num="970" class="">violence</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="3793" class="">mob</st>,

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="4128" class="">crowd</st> of <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> them,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2896" class="">screaming</st>, “<st data-num="142">Away with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!”

As <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> was <st data-num="3195" class="">about to</st> be <st data-num="1521" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3925" class="">barracks</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="5506" class="">commanding officer</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="1832">May</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3004">say</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?” The officer<n id="5" /> <st data-num="5346" class="">replied</st>,<n id="6" /> “Do you <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1676" class="">Greek</st>?<n id="7" />

<st data-num="686" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4771 1510">you’re</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> that <st data-num="124" class="">Egyptian</st> who started a <st data-num="387" class="">rebellion</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1806" class="">led</st> the <st data-num="5070" class="">4,000</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> of the ‘<st data-num="4607" class="">Assassins</st>’<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2048" class="">wilderness</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3778 2250" class="">sometime</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">ago</st>?”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3004">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st><n id="2" /> from <st data-num="5018" class="">Tarsus</st> in <st data-num="2791" class="">Cilicia</st>, a <st data-num="4177" class="">citizen</st> of an <st data-num="3756 767">important</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1189">Please</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2010" class="">allow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>.”
When the commanding officer had given him permission, Paul stood on the steps and gestured to the people with his hand. When they had become silent, he addressed them in Aramaic,
